name: Modern Signal
tagline: Custom Website and Database Design / Development
description:
Founded in 2001, Modern Signal is a Washington, DC-area custom website design and development firm with solutions for associations, non-profits, foundations and private companies - large and small alike.
Our team provides the complete range of expertise - strategy, information architecture, project management, programming, database development, graphic design and interface development - all working in concert to the benefit of your organization and your technology projects. 
We have over 16 years of experience in the design and development of enterprise-level, custom-built websites and databases particularly in ASP.net, ColdFusion and SQL Server technologies. 
When your organizations' needs can't be shoehorned into an off-the-shelf CMS, our team of experts can bring your complex business rules and vision together into a successful website project.
